General.Name: Ho Chi Minh City Infrastructure Investment JSC
General.Description: Ho Chi Minh City Infrastructure Investment Joint Stock Company engages in the investment, construction, and exploitation of infrastructure business in Vietnam. The company operates under build-operate-transfer (BOT) contracts; build-transfer (BT) contracts; collects road traffic toll fees; trades in real estate floors; and water distribution networks. It is also involved in the production and sale of specialized equipment related to traffic toll collection and construction; construction of civil, industrial, traffic and road works, and drain pipes; undertakes bridge and residential infrastructure projects, as well as real estate projects; and provision of clean water. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
